TOC : Basic features >

 

Print the report

 Top  Previous  Next

 

 

Click the Print the report icon on the toolbar.

Set the printer name, number of copies, print range and other options in the Print dialog box, click the [OK] button.

For detailed printing options such as gray printing or handouts, click the [Option] button in the Print dialog box.

 

 

Target paper :

 

If multiple reports are bound as single report, paper type is shown in the format of By Report(paper size of report1, paper size of report2, ..., paper size of reportn) and Paper orientation option is disabled.

ex) By Report(A4,A3)

 

 

Adjust printing scale :

 

To print by original design size even if the printing paper size is smaller than the design paper size, uncheck Adjust printing scale option in the Print dialog box, and check Print divide option in the Option dialog box.
